title: In game lag, but games still runs
body: My league was running perfectly fine before but recently this issue bothers me a lot, I have average 200 fps and 60 ping, game still runs in the backgroud but my screen freezes. HELPPP

replies.body: Are you on a Mac or PC?  Some mac users are currently having issues with hot corners getting int he way and causing that freeze.  Otherwise, let me know and I'll be happy to help!
I'm on a Mac, do you know how to solve it ? I don't use hot corners tho.

Ah, well the hot corners may have been enabled somehow anyway. I recommend using this [guide ](http://osxdaily.com/2016/08/10/disable-hot-corners-mac/)just to make sure that it's disabled for now.  If you continue to have any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to help you individually so we can figure out a solution!

Hey, I checked out my hot corners and they were disabled. Recently I find out a new bug I guess I don't know what it is, when I'm in legacy client, I go in and find normal match, when I accept and click the message bar and try to type, league will shut off immediately , please help!!

It sounds like your network is having problems connecting to champion select and getting left behind.  It's important to resolve that asap to prevent any lower priority queue penalties, so I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
it isn't the network, I guarantee you.
